pullRequest.title: Refactor: move method getNeighborsValidatingCanals to RouteFinder

commit.message:
Refactor: move method getNeighborsValidatingCanals to RouteFinder

Reduces game-core dependencies in GameMap

nodes.bodyText: As far as I can tell this constructor is only used by this class, so it might as well be private, without the annotation.

I'm not entirely convinced this field is really necessary.
The GameMap object is still there, so why not create this object on the fly inside of getNeighborsValidatingCanals?

commit.message: Remove @VisibleForTesting annoation and mark constructor as private for now.
